DOC.brief_summary: We propose to evaluate the question of whether there is a significant difference between the traditional method of serratus flap tissue expander reconstruction and the acellular matrix method.
DOC.brief_title: Use of Dermal Matrix in Breast Reconstruction
DOC.detailed_description: We propose a double blinded, randomized study of 60 women comparing outcomes which will include postoperative pain, complication rates and aesthetic outcome as assessed by the patient and a plastic surgeon blinded to the method of reconstruction.
DOC.criteria: All women who are candidates for breast reconstruction using tissue expanders after mastectomy Other forms of breast reconstruction after mastectomy
